info.title: Mod Picker Public API
info.description:
This is the API specification for Mod Picker's public API.  For general information about the API refer to [the API help page](https://modpicker/help/api).  You will need an API Token to use the Mod Picker API, which you can create from the API Access tab of your [user settings page](https://modpicker.com/help/user_settings#api-access) on Mod Picker.  If you need help feel free to contact us on the [Mod Picker Discord Server](http://discord.gg/GCKrwTU).

## Date formats

### Data
All dates in data rendered by the server are provided as strings in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

### Filters
All dates provided to the server for filtering purposes should be provided in `mm/dd/YYYY` or relative date format.  The relative date format supports strings in the following formats:

- Now
- `x` minute(s) ago
- `x` hour(s) ago
- `x` day(s) ago
- `x` month(s) ago

## Images

### Users

User images can be retrieved from  `https://modpicker.com/users/id-size.ext`, where id is the mod's integer id, and ext is the image extension provided by the `image_ext` field.  User image sizes are listed below:

- small (48px)
- medium (96px)
- big (250px)

### Mods

Mod images can be retrieved from  `https://modpicker.com/mods/id-size.ext`, where id is the mod's integer id, and ext is the image extension provided by the `image_ext` field.  User image sizes are listed below:

- small (100px)
- medium (210px)
- big (300px)

post.description: Search for mods on Mod Picker with extensive filtering options.

correctable.description: BaseMod, BaseCompatibilityNote, BaseInstallOrderNote, or BaseLoadOrderNote depending on `correctable_type`

joined.description: Date string for when the user joined Mod Picker.

last_sign_in_at.description: Date string for when the user last signed in to Mod Picker.

image_type.description: Extension for the user's avatar image.

email.description: Only present if the user has chosen to make their email public.

about_me.description: Markdown text displayed on the user's profile page.

comments_count.description: The number of comments on the user's profile.  For the number of comments the user has submitted see `submitted_comments_count`.

joined.description: Date string for when the user joined Mod Picker.

last_sign_in_at.description: Date string for when the user last signed in to Mod Picker.

image_type.description: Extension for the user's avatar image.

email.description: Only present if the user has chosen to make their email public.

comments_count.description: The number of comments on the user's profile.  For the number of comments the user has submitted see `submitted_comments_count`.

joined.description: Date string for when the user joined Mod Picker.

last_sign_in_at.description: Date string for when the user last signed in to Mod Picker.

image_type.description: Extension for the user's avatar image.

items.description: Decimal load order FormID of the overriden record based on the plugin's master dependencies.

is_official.description: True for games and official DLC.

is_utility.description: True for mods which are installed outside of the game's data directory.

aliases.description: Acroynms or alternative names for the mod.

status.description: The status of the mod.  Can be \"good\", \"outdated\", or \"unstable\".

primary_category_id.description: The id of the primary category the mod belongs to.  Null for games.

secondary_category_id.description: The id of the secondary category the mod belongs to.  May be null if the mod has not been assigned a secondary category.

average_rating.description: The average review rating of the mod.  0 if the mod has no approved reviews.

reputation.description: A metric computed from the mod's average_rating and reviews_count.

plugins_count.description: The number of plugins associated with the mod.

asset_files_count.description: The number of asset files associated with the mod.

required_mods_count.description: The number of mods that are required by the mod.

required_by_count.description: The number of mods that require the mod.

tags_count.description: The number of tags assigned to the mod.

stars_count.description: The number of times the mod has been starred (favorited) on Mod Picker.

mod_lists_count.description: The number of Mod Picker mod lists the mod has been used in.

reviews_count.description: The number of reviews on the mod.

compatibility_notes_count.description: The number of compatibility notes on the mod.

install_order_notes_count.description: The number of install order notes on the mod.

load_order_notes_count.description: The number of load order notes on the mod.

corrections_count.description: The number of corrections (appeals) on the mod.

disallow_contributors.description: True if the mod author has disallowed contributors from editing the mod page.

has_adult_content.description: True if the mod has been flagged as having adult content.

hidden.description: True if the mod has been hidden from public viewing.

approved.description: True if the mod has been approved for public viewing.

released.description: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date string for when the mod was released.

updated.description: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date string for when the mod was last updated.

submitted.description: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date string for when the mod was submitted to Mod Picker.

image_type.description: Extension for the image associated with the mod.
